title: Prove the Erd≈ës factorial divisibility conjecture
description:
Read PROBLEM.md carefully. Your job is ONLY to decompose this into subtasks - DO NOT implement anything yourself.

Phase 1: Create an execute task to write a natural language proof (PROOF.md)
Phase 2: Create an execute task to formalize the theorem STATEMENT in Lean (just the statement, with sorry for the proof body)  
Phase 3: Create a verify task to check the statement matches the problem
Phase 4: Create execute tasks for each lemma needed for the Lean proof (use testCommand 'lake build' on ALL lean tasks)
Phase 5: Create an execute task to assemble the final proof
Phase 6: Create a verify task for final verification (lake build + grep sorry)

IMPORTANT: You are the ADVISOR. Create tasks for the execute and verify agents. Do not write code yourself.
status: Reading problem statement and planning decomposition
